subject: Boats and Boating
Oceans
lead_paragraph: John Kostecki had one of the safest jobs in the last Volvo Ocean Race, flying from port to port to serve as the tactician for the Ericsson Racing Team for a handful of inshore races.
snippet: John Kostecki had one of the safest jobs in the last Volvo Ocean Race, flying from port to port to serve as the tactician for the Ericsson Racing Team for a handful of inshore races.
